title: Why Jordan B Peterson cant stand church and what Screwtape has to say about that
description:
Another thought on JBP's New Year's Q/A Question 4 on church. Following https://youtu.be/1pNn91Ewzbc and my video https://youtu.be/ZdjBvSqPWCc 

CS Lewis The Screwtape Letters https://www.amazon.com/Screwtape-Letters-C-S-Lewis-ebook/dp/B002BD2V2Y
